sentences.sContent: It is worthwhile to include really high-quality illustrations.
sentences.sCn: 把真正高质量的插图包括进去是值得的。

sentences.sContent: ...He took a 30% salary cut but felt it worthwhile for the greater intellectual opportunities...

remMethod.val: worth(值得) ＋ while(时间) → 值得花时间的

words.tran: 值得的；有价值的；配得上的，相称的；可尊敬的；应…的

trans.tranOther: worth spending time, money or effort on
